original_text: (Indeed, when Gentiles, who do not have the law, do by nature things required by the law, they are a law for themselves, even though they do not have the law.
korean_text: (율법 없는 이방인이 본성으로 율법의 일을 행할 때에는 이 사람은 율법이 없어도 자기가 자기에게 율법이 되나니

sentences.original_text: who do not have the law
do by nature things required by the law
they are a law for themselves
even though they do not have the law
